name: Field Conversion Report
description: This report should be used to evaluate technician performance around conversions. This report includes the SLM conversion rate, which is especially useful in evaluating a technician as it counts the job as converted if they set a lead, sell a membership or convert the job. If you are looking for a conversion rate that accounts for leads set, this is a great calculation. This report also includes other helpful KPIs such as options per opportunity, billable hours, and basic conversion metrics.

name: Sales Report by Field Employee/Technician
description: This report is used to focus on conversion of estimates. This report is best used to evaluate how effective your field employee is at converting an estimate, independent of whether or not work was performed that day. This would be a great report to use to evaluate performance if a field employee is focused on selling.

name: Sold By Sales Detail Report by Completion Date
description: Upgrade to legacy Sold By Sales Detail Report by Completion Date. Displays invoice details of completed jobs, based on the Sold By technician. Use this to evaluate the work generated by your salesmen that has been completed.

name: Technician Performance Board
description: Upgrade to legacy Technician Performance Board Report. Use it to track your technicians' performance including completed revenue, conversion rate, job average, replacement lead conversion, and work in progress.

name: Technician Performance Board (M)
description: Upgrade to the legacy Technician Performance Board (M) Report. Includes metrics on completed revenue, job average, and conversion rates.

name: Technician Timesheet with Technician Information
description: This report will give a breakdown by technician of paid time with additional information about the technician such as technician business unit and Payroll ID.
